alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay; Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 29 at 10:58AM AKST until January 29 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills occurring. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta and Bristol Bay. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An extremely cold Arctic airmass remains in place over Southwest Alaska. The Kuskokwim Delta and Bristol Bay have observed frigid wind chills at or below -40. Winds will slowly diminish through this evening, but the Arctic airmass will stay in place, prolonging very cold temperatures through Tuesday. Temperatures will then gradually rebound through late this week.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
